attributes.action: Mr Cameron, stop Israel killing innocent civilians in Palestine at once
attributes.additional_details:
By signing this petition, you will be asking David Cameron to put pressure on israels president to stop this horrific attack, innocent women, children and old people are dying... Yes a country has the right to defend it self, but you cant take down a whole tree that has a few bad apples...
By adding each signature we are one step
Closer to ending this devastating attack..

Please sign and ask relatives, friends and family to sign also.
